actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to allow for devices with a predetermined change control plan to be marketed  without submitting a supplemental application or premarket notification if the changes to such devices are consistent with such plan.

summary.text: This bill allows changes to be made to medical devices without the need for supplemental applications or premarket notifications if the changes are made in accordance with a predetermined change control plan.

titles.title: A bill to allow for devices with a predetermined change control plan to be marketed  without submitting a supplemental application or premarket notification if the changes to such devices are consistent with such plan.

A bill to allow for devices with a predetermined change control plan to be marketed  without submitting a supplemental application or premarket notification if the changes to such devices are consistent with such plan.
